33 namespace reactphysics3d {

38 
39 // Class TriangleMesh
47 class TriangleMesh {
48 
49  protected:
50 
52  List<TriangleVertexArray*> mTriangleArrays;
53 
54  public:
55 
57  TriangleMesh();
58 
60  ~TriangleMesh() = default;
61 
63  void addSubpart(TriangleVertexArray* triangleVertexArray);
64 
66  TriangleVertexArray* getSubpart(uint indexSubpart) const;
67 
69  uint getNbSubparts() const;
70 };
71 
72 // Add a subpart of the mesh
76 inline void TriangleMesh::addSubpart(TriangleVertexArray* triangleVertexArray) {
77  mTriangleArrays.add(triangleVertexArray );
78 }
79 
80 // Return a pointer to a given subpart (triangle vertex array) of the mesh
85 inline TriangleVertexArray* TriangleMesh::getSubpart(uint indexSubpart) const {
86  assert(indexSubpart < mTriangleArrays.size());
87  return mTriangleArrays[indexSubpart];
88 }
89 
90 // Return the number of sub-parts of the mesh
94 inline uint TriangleMesh::getNbSubparts() const {
95  return mTriangleArrays.size();
96 }
97 
98 }
99
